Title:
Xanthone containing Buellia (Lichenized Ascomycota,
Caliciaceae) from China
Keywords: Taxonomy, Lichenized fungi, ITS, New species
Abstract:
14 species of Buellia containing xanthone are reported
from China, including 2 species new to science and 6 new records to
China. They have a common character of yellowish surface, and a UV +
yellow to orange reaction, thus could be separated from other Buellia
species easily. Morphological, chemical and phylogenetic analyses were
carried out. Detailed descriptions and figures for each new species, and
a key to these xanthone containing species from China are provided.
